title: Venezuela Steps Up Dollar Sales to Shore Up the Bolivar
description: Venezuela’s interim government is selling more dollars through private banks as part of an ongoing effort to keep the currency stable amid political uncertainty.
content: Venezuela’s interim government is selling more dollars through private banks as part of an ongoing effort to keep the currency stable amid political uncertainty.
